sentences.sentence: Now he's in real trouble. He's accused of plagiarism.
sentences.translation: 现在他陷入真正的麻烦了。他被指控剽窃。

sentences.sentence: If you want to compliment someone on the work they have done and imitate it, just make sure you do it the right way to avoid committing plagiarism.
sentences.translation: 如果你想赞赏并模仿某人的作品，就要确保你使用的是正确的方式，以避免抄袭。
曾有过关于剽窃的指控。
